doc.title: The Streets of San Francisco

credit.role: Inspector Steve Keller aka Lou Felton, Ex-Con
Major General Robert 'Red' West, US Army, Retired
Sergeant Earl Eddie Mack, California Dept. of Corrections
Officer Nelson, California Dept. of Corrections
Dr. Arnold Stephen Holtfield/Dr. Martin Avery/Peter Callahan/Dr. Raymond Faraday/Dr. William M. Debner
Major Frank Kramer, US Army Doctor

doc.plot: A pair of plainclothes homicide detectives, Lt. Mike Stone and Inspector Steve Keller, cruise the streets of San Francisco solving a variety of crimes, usually involving murder. Stone is the street-smart 20-year veteran cop, and Keller is the college-educated rookie. Much of the series' success was due to the friendly by-play and relationship between the two leads.
